<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="forever" id="zb2{p~~s6d^8.O%}g:l4" x="20" y="20"></block>

      <block type="music_play_note" id="%AkL=TPqOw]^8cX=Tkx#">

        </value>
        <value name="duration">

        </value>
        <next>

              <shadow type="device_beat" id="lSpf+(G6PW`,Rew7|GO?">

            </value>
            <next>

                  <shadow type="device_note" id="$$MB~5H475jL3^1|CBsq">

                </value>
                <value name="duration">
                  <shadow type="device_beat" id="`h$Z3x_m3AI[Fu,eP-av">

    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
